channel.title: 0.9.11 Patch Notes
channel.description:
## General:
* Added bleeding and poisoned indicators on the player's portrait. * Added Reaper room.
## Duchess:
* Bat Eyelashes now tells you the target's class type.
## Mastermind:
* New day ability Dirty Work. If there are no more Unseen members left, you can become the Assassin at the beginning of the night. * New night ability Foresight. Determine a player's converted class type or if they cannot be converted. 4 uses.
## Mercenary:
* Stand Guard now has 4 uses.
## Possessor:
* Added night ability Puppet Strings - Control a player and force them to kill another. * Possess now has three uses.
## Bug Fixes:
* Fixed rare login screen bug when you swapped Steam accounts * "Return to Lobby" button is restored * Logs should be less bloaty * _Thronebot_ makes his return to Discord * Some others

item.title: 0.9.11 Patch Notes
item.dc:creator: Simon
item.description:
ooh
maybe it shows a door to their room, with a nameplate on it with either illegible scribbles, or the dead’s name on it, and when it goes to show the class, an animation/a camera movement happens , and basically it seems as though the door opens up before the camera and the camera flys through to see the room from the normal angle, with their class displayed (but on the code side of things, it can just be an animation of a door in the camera, the door opens, and the animation flys toward and past the camera/grows until out of frame completely)
does that make sense at all?

Read full topic

item.title: 0.9.11 Patch Notes
item.dc:creator: Sketch
item.description:
Like a black void that swirls around the victim’s body that is lifted when the class is displayed by text? Or maybe a slow fade in to the class’ room once the text pops up?

I love that idea.

Read full topic

item.title: 0.9.11 Patch Notes
item.dc:creator: Simon
item.description:
maybe an option to not see the room until class is revealed?
that way you still get to see the cool room, and the journal doesnt draw your focus away from it

Read full topic

item.title: 0.9.11 Patch Notes
item.dc:creator: Sketch
item.description:
ThePlex:

You’re gonna find out either way though. it’s only 5 seconds.

You’re missing the point. Within those 5 seconds, I’m enjoying the anticipation of discovering that player’s class. Even reading the journal isn’t a guarantee. Sometimes I’ll read a perfect journal of an Observer or Princess and then “Iva Scumsmith was the Reaper” and be totally shocked.

With rooms, you immediately know the class. I enjoy the “gameshow build-up” of going through the player’s journal and death sequence before the final class reveal is made. It adds more drama.

Read full topic

item.title: 0.9.11 Patch Notes
item.dc:creator: ThePlex
item.description:
You’re gonna find out either way though. it’s only 5 seconds. Sometimes it’s even in the Journal.

Read full topic

item.title: 0.9.11 Patch Notes
item.dc:creator: Sketch
item.description:
í42-Xblade:

Added Reaper room.

Am I the only one that doesn’t like seeing unique rooms upon the player’s death? I think the suspense is killed when you immediately recognize the class of the dead player. I prefer to wait for the text pop-up to tell me!

Is there/will there be an option to homogenize the rooms that are shown?

Read full topic

item.title: 0.9.11 Patch Notes
item.dc:creator: í42-Xblade
item.description:
General:

  • Added bleeding and poisoned indicators on the player’s portrait.
  • Added Reaper room.

Duchess:

  • Bat Eyelashes now tells you the target’s class type.

Mastermind:

  • New day ability Dirty Work. If there are no more Unseen members left, you can become the Assassin at the beginning of the night.
  • New night ability Foresight. Determine a player’s converted class type or if they cannot be converted. 4 uses.

Mercenary:

  • Stand Guard now has 4 uses.

Possessor:

  • Added night ability Puppet Strings - Control a player and force them to kill another.
  • Possess now has three uses.

Bug Fixes:

  • Fixed rare login screen bug when you swapped Steam accounts
  • “Return to Lobby” button is restored
  • Logs should be less bloaty
  • Thronebot makes his return to Discord
  • Some others

Read full topic
